_header: In Heaven shall dwell all christian men
Bibliographic Ghosts: Cambridge UK, Cambridge University Library Dd.4.51, ff. 7, 8-8v, 9: text of couplet missing; only lines that follow it: Be thu no [ ] / Nor no th[ ]…But as [ ] / Ryȝthte [ ]
_description: Follow the Commandments — a single couplet introducing the Ten Commandments (5845) in the some MSS of the Speculum Christiani (Secunda Tabula)

BodLauMis513.Transcription:
In heuene schal dwelle alle cristen menþat knowe and kepe goddys
                    byddynges ten…

Bod89.Transcription:
In heuen schall dwell al cristen men þat knowe and kepe goddis
                    byddynges ten
Bod89.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             “The Towneley Play of the Doctors and the Speculum Christiani.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         31 (1916): 223-6: 224-5.

BodHat97.Transcription:
In heven shal dwell all crystyn menThat knowes and kepys goddys
                    byddyngys ten

                    byddyngs ten

in heuen schall duell all cristen menthat knawes & kepes godes
                    byddyngs ten

BLLan344.Transcription:
In heuene schal dwelle al cristin menþat knowe and kepe godis
                    biddingis ten
BLLan344.Note:
Written as prose and rubricated. Folios have been re-numbered to include
                    the flyleaves, and foliation here refers to the new numbers.
BLLan344.Editions:
Holmstedt,  Gustaf,
                        ed.  
             Speculum Christiani.
